"You... want to shake my hand? O-of cour: "Um, see you."

"Oh, <%me>!
You came to see me. I'm so happy!"
"Those two just now? I've never met them before. Lately, a lot of people have been coming up to me wanting to shake my hand."

"Hehe, you must have had the same thing happen, right? Everyone really admires us Guardians...
Of course, it's all thanks to you!"
"Perhaps we should find somewhere quiet to have lunch, then we can..."
"Excuse me... Have you got a minute?"
"Sorry to bother you. I just need to ask you a few questions."
"Would you two happen to be Guardians?"

"Yep, that's right...
And you are...?"
"I'm Asuna. I'm a newbie, I just started today."
"As soon as I logged in, I got spat out here without any kind of tutorial."
"Um, 'newbie'? And what's a tutorial...?"

"You too, huh...
I've been talking to people ever since I arrived in this world."
"All of them had the exact same reaction that you did."
"They told me that if I have any problems, I can ask the Guardians about them, so I came to find you."
"If she's in trouble, I think we should do everything we can to help."
"Let's hear her out for now."
"If she needs our help, we have no choice."
"Of course. We'll be happy to help you however we can."
"Thank you very much! As I said, my name is Asuna."
"I'm Matoi. And this is..."
"It's nice to meet you both."
"This is Kirito. He came to this world along with me."
"I'm Kirito. Nice to meet you. Have you two been playing this game long?"
"Um... Game?"

"......
Can you tell us about the world? Where are we? What sort of place is this?"
"...Well, we're on an ARKS Ship, which is part of the Oracle Fleet..."

"And we belong to the ARKS, a planetary investigation team...
Would you say that's accurate?"
"That was perfect."
"I don't think that's what he was asking."
"Right. But why would you need to ask about something everyone knows?"
"Yeah, he probably wasn't looking for such an obvious answer..."
"I'm sorry, Kirito was it? I don't really understand what you're trying to ask..."
"...I see."
"Thanks, you two. We're going to take a look around this world for a bit longer."
"H-huh?"
"If there's anything else we don't understand we'll give you a shout. Hope you can help us out then."
"Yes of course, but..."
"Let's go, Asuna."
"Wha-, Kirito? But..."
"...Right. Thank you for all your help. See you."
"Ah, okay. Take care."
"...They're gone. They sure were a curious bunch."
"You got that right. Those two probably weren't ARKS."
"Xiera! Huh? What do you mean by that?"
"It seems they came here from Earth through \"PSO2\"."
"\"PSO2\"... That was the game that was popular with Hitsugi and everyone on Earth, right?"
"Yes, the game Mother created to access our world. The very same \"PSO2\"."
"It used to be that anyone capable could come to this world through it..."
"But access should currently be limited to those with the proper clearance..."
"Did those two have clearance?"
"I haven't received any contact from Enga at Earth Guide about them."
"...But it is bothering me. I'm going to contact him myself to check it out."
"Could the two of you keep an eye on them and make sure they don't get into any trouble?"
"They seemed to think they're inside a game, so who knows what might happen."
"Of course. Looks like we've ended up on a mission...but we'll do our best!"
"Huh? Actually... How did you already know what was going on when you contacted us?"
"That's easy! When I heard the Guardians were out on a friendly stroll together, I thought I'd sneak a peek at... Erk."
"You were watching us?! Xiera!"

"<%me>!
The rest is up to you! Xiera out!"
"Kirito. They're not NPCs are they...?"
"Right. But that doesn't mean they were players either, they didn't see this world as a game."
"They're all treating it like this is the real world they live in."
"I felt the same thing. And our outfits..."
"Even though we converted from ALO, we're in our SAO gear."
"This isn't any ordinary game... That's right, the logout!"
"It's showing up in the menu, so we should be able to leave..."
"Whew... There shouldn't be any major danger then."
"A lot of stuff doesn't sit right with me, but we did go through all that trouble converting. Let's just take a look around."
"Fine with me."
"We should figure out how the fighting works first. Wonder where we should start..."
"The gear and outfits on those people we passed earlier really caught my eye."
"I know, why don't we try asking Matoi where all the good vendors are?"
"Girl in Knight's Armor"
"Boy in Black"
